title: Cubitts: Product Design for 'Artist of Hampstead' Collection
description:
Commissioned by Cubitts for their Hampstead Collection, the sunglasses were inspired by the local architecture of the Isokon firm and its constructivist roots.

The project combined Design Thinking principles with a human-centered approach, with a focus on empathy and understanding of user needs at every stage, from prototyping through to production.

Collaboration across different teams played a crucial role in refining the design's adaptability and problem-solving, ensuring the product not only met market expectations but also overcame unforeseen challenges.
